description.S2: He wants a special cache of anthrocillin,
description.S3: found in the Emerald Vale Community Center.
description.S4: Esther confronted you outside of Abernathy's house,
description.S5: and suggested that you should give the medicine to her instead of Abernathy.

blurb.B1: You can find the Experimental Anthrocillin in the Emerald Vale Community Center inside the medical area.
blurb.B2: You'll need the Medical Bay key to get in there,
blurb.B3: which can be found on one of the Marauders.
blurb.B4: Once you obtain it you can give it to Esther or Martin.

dialog.speaker: Player
dialog.utterance: I've got that medicine you were after.

dialog.speaker: EstherBlaine (Female)
dialog.utterance: Thanks. I'll see to it that this medicine gets to the people who need it.

dialog.speaker: EstherBlaine (Female)
dialog.utterance: Here - something for your trouble. Nothing personal, but I hope we never do business together again. Don't want to make a habit of consorting with smuggler types.

dialog.speaker: Player
dialog.utterance: It's not that simple. You want my silence, you're going to have to buy it.

dialog.speaker: Player
dialog.utterance: Never? That's harsh. At least leave me something to remember you by.

dialog.speaker: EstherBlaine (Female)
dialog.utterance: And there it is. The reason I don't like depending on a criminal. I kept a little contingency fee in case you decided to shake me down.

dialog.speaker: EstherBlaine (Female)
dialog.utterance: You do have some cheek on you. Lucky for you, I kept a little contingency fee in case you tried to negotiate with me.

dialog.speaker: EstherBlaine (Female)
dialog.utterance: Oh, I'm an actuary. That means I keep tabs on a worker's living expenses. How much it costs to feed, clothe, shelter, bury, and replace your average human worker.

dialog.speaker: EstherBlaine (Female)
dialog.utterance: Technically, I'm employed by the Spacer's Choice Department of Human Resources.
